3. Analyze the following block of code, and describe what happens in each line.

```bash
$ curl -o pride_and_prejudice.txt https://gutenberg.org/files/1342/1342-0.txt
$ mkdir p_and_p
$ mv pride_and_prejudice.txt p_and_p
$ mv pride_and_prejudice.txt p_and_p.txt
$ cd p_and_p
$ grep "yes" p_and_p.txt | wc -l
```
